actions.name: List security groups
actions.description:
Lists OpenStack Networking security groups to which the
 specified tenant has access.
 
 
 The list shows the unique ID for and the rules that are
 associated with each security group.

responses.body:
{
 "security_groups": [
 {
 "description": "default",
 "id": "85cc3048-abc3-43cc-89b3-377341426ac5",
 "name": "default",
 "security_group_rules": [
 {

 "ethertype": "IPv6",
 "id": "3c0e45ff-adaf-4124-b083-bf390e5482ff",
 "port_range_max": null,
 "port_range_min": null,
 "protocol": null,
 "remote_group_id": null,
 "remote_ip_prefix": null,
 "security_group_id": "85cc3048-abc3-43cc-89b3-377341426ac5",
 "tenant_id": "e4f50856753b4dc6afee5fa6b9b6c550"
 },
 {

 },
 {

 "port_range_max": null,

 "protocol": null,
 "remote_group_id": "85cc3048-abc3-43cc-89b3-377341426ac5",

 },
 {

actions.name: Create security group
actions.description:
Creates an OpenStack Networking security group.
 
 
 This operation creates a security group with default
 security group rules for the IPv4 and IPv6 ether types.

responses.body:
{
 "security_group": {
 "description": "security group for webservers",
 "id": "2076db17-a522-4506-91de-c6dd8e837028",
 "name": "new-webservers",
 "security_group_rules": [
 {
 "direction": "egress",
 "ethertype": "IPv4",
 "id": "38ce2d8e-e8f1-48bd-83c2-d33cb9f50c3d",
 "port_range_max": null,
 "port_range_min": null,
 "protocol": null,
 "remote_group_id": null,
 "remote_ip_prefix": null,
 "security_group_id": "2076db17-a522-4506-91de-c6dd8e837028",
 "tenant_id": "e4f50856753b4dc6afee5fa6b9b6c550"
 },
 {
 "direction": "egress",
 "ethertype": "IPv6",
 "id": "565b9502-12de-4ffd-91e9-68885cff6ae1",
 "port_range_max": null,
 "port_range_min": null,
 "protocol": null,
 "remote_group_id": null,
 "remote_ip_prefix": null,
 "security_group_id": "2076db17-a522-4506-91de-c6dd8e837028",
 "tenant_id": "e4f50856753b4dc6afee5fa6b9b6c550"
 }
 ],
 "tenant_id": "e4f50856753b4dc6afee5fa6b9b6c550"
 }
}

security_group_id.description:
The unique identifier of
 the security group.

actions.name: Show security group
actions.description:
Shows details for a specified security group.
 
 
 This operation returns a response body that contains the
 description, name, ID, and security group rules associated
 with the specified security group and tenant ID.

responses.body:
{
 "security_group": {
 "description": "default",
 "id": "85cc3048-abc3-43cc-89b3-377341426ac5",

actions.name: Delete security group
actions.description:
Deletes an OpenStack Networking security group.
 
 
 This operation deletes an OpenStack Networking security
 group and its associated security group rules, provided
 that a port is not associated with the security group.
 
 
 This operation does not require a request body. This
 operation does not return a response body.

actions.name: List security group rules
actions.description:
Lists a summary of all OpenStack Networking security group
 rules that the specified tenant can access.
 
 
 The list provides the unique ID for each security group
 rule.

responses.body:
{
 "security_group_rules": [

actions.name: Create security group rule
actions.description: Creates an OpenStack Networking security group rule.

rules-security-groups-id.description:
The unique identifier of
 the security group rule.

actions.name: Show security group rule
actions.description:
Shows detailed information for a specified security group
 rule.
 
 
 The response body contains the following information about
 the security group rule:

actions.name: Delete security group rule
actions.description:
Deletes a specified rule from an OpenStack Networking
 security group.
